actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee with amendments. With written report No. 105-310.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 549.
Passed Senate with amendments by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife, and Oceans

official_title: A bill to improve the National Wildlife Refuge System, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Wildlife Refuge System Improvement Act of 1998

summary.text: National Wildlife Refuge System Improvement Act of 1998 - Transfers to the Corps of Engineers, without reimbursement, certain land of the Upper Mississippi River Wildlife and Fish Refuge in Minnesota. Terminates the jurisdiction of the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service over: (1) the Killcohook Coordination Area in New Jersey and Delaware; and (2) Lake Elsie National Wildlife Refuge in Richland County, North Dakota. Revokes Executive Orders 6582, 8648, and 8152. Renames the Klamath Forest National Wildlife Refuge as the Klamath Marsh National Wildlife Refuge. Amends the National Wildlife Refuge System Administration Act of 1996 to specify the periods of imprisonment for knowing violations of the Act (not more than one year) and for other violations (not more than 180 days).
